rule-calculation.rule:
let r = NetCashFlow - (NetCashFlowsOperating + NetCashFlowsInvesting + NetCashFlowsFinancing + ExchangeGainsLosses)
          return if (r ne 0 and r eq ExchangeGainsLosses * -1) then NetCashFlow - (NetCashFlowsOperating + NetCashFlowsInvesting + NetCashFlowsFinancing) else r
rule-calculation.audit-trail:
let $r = NetCashFlow[664,000,000] - (NetCashFlowsOperating[5,300,000,000] + NetCashFlowsInvesting[-2,686,000,000] + NetCashFlowsFinancing[-2,058,000,000] + ExchangeGainsLosses[108,000,000])
          return if ($r ne 0 and $r eq ExchangeGainsLosses[108,000,000] * -1) then NetCashFlow[664,000,000] - (NetCashFlowsOperating[5,300,000,000] + NetCashFlowsInvesting[-2,686,000,000] + NetCashFlowsFinancing[-2,058,000,000]) else $r

rules.rule: ((NetIncomeLoss / Revenues) * (1 + ((Assets - Equity) / Equity))) / ((1 / (Revenues / Assets)) - (((NetIncomeLoss / Revenues) * (1 + (((Assets - Equity) / Equity))))))
